stealth.translation[0].definitions[0].de: when you do something very quietly, slowly, or secretly, so that no one notices you
stealth.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Cats rely on stealth to catch their prey.
stealth.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a system of making military aircraft that cannot be discovered by radar instruments
stealth.translation[0].definitions[1].no: stealth bomber/aircraft/fighter etc (=a plane made using this system)
